sentences.en: Cars are too costly . They are meant only for the affluent.
sentences.cn: 汽车太昂贵了,只适合给富有的人用.

sentences.en: Cigarette smoking used to be commoner among affluent people.
sentences.cn: 吸烟曾经在富人中间更为普遍。

sentences.en: He disliked their affluent way of life.
sentences.cn: 他不喜欢他们那种优裕的生活方式.

sentences.en: He was affluent in worldly goods.
He was born to an affluent family.
It's a fallacy that the affluent give relatively more to charity than the less prosperous.
sentences.cn: 富人比穷人对慈善事业的捐助更多些；这种观点是一种谬见。

sentences.en: More affluent old people would pay higher premiums for their health - insurance coverage.
sentences.cn: 有钱的老年人要为健康保险支付更高的保险费.

sentences.en: The diet of the affluent has not changed much over the decades.
sentences.cn: 富人的饮食数十年来没怎么变。

sentences.en: The land is affluent in natural resources.
The Strand is one of London's busiest and most affluent streets.
sentences.cn: 斯特兰德街是伦敦最繁华、最富足的街道之一。

sentences.en: The toil and resources of the poorer nations pay for the prosperity of the affluent peoples.
sentences.cn: 穷国既出劳力又出资源,换来了富国的繁荣.

sentences.en: These designer items let the less affluent know that they've outclassed.
sentences.cn: 这些名牌产品让并不富裕的人知道自己并不富有.

sentences.en: These publications target the affluent customer who appreciates and purchases fine - quality outerwear.
sentences.cn: 通过这些出版物,富裕的客户都赞赏及购货的这些优良品质的外衣.

sentences.en: What affluent Singaporeans need is a keen awareness of our cultural heritage.
sentences.cn: 现在新加坡人不缺吃、住、穿,还缺什么?缺的就是深厚坚实的人文意识.

trans.tran_en: having plenty of money, nice houses, expensive things etc
The affluent are people who are affluent
